subject: Politics
title: Soft Power
description: A fast breakdown of Soft Power for builders.

hook.text: Hollywood, Coca-Cola, and Harvard project American power without a single soldier. That's soft power at work.

buildup.text: Joseph Nye coined 'soft power' â€” the ability to attract and persuade rather than coerce. Culture is the weapon.

discovery.text: K-pop, anime, and Bollywood show that cultural exports shape global perceptions and political influence.

twist.text: Soft power is fragile. One scandal, one policy failure, and years of cultural goodwill can vanish overnight.

climax.text: Nations invest billions in soft power. Universities, media, and brands are strategic assets, not just products.

punchline.text: Soft power makes people want what you want. No force needed.
